column4: [Ubuntu 11.10 GNOME Shell 3.2.1]  '~$ ping 192.168.178.33; 9 packets transmitted, 9 received, 0% packet loss, time 8001ms.' Firefox 8.0: 'smb://192.168.178.33; Firefox doesn't know how to open this address, because the protocol (smb) isn't associated with any program.' What DEB program package do I need to install yet?
why should ff handle smb requests?
It does so on another Ubuntu computer of mine.
thats afaik at least not default ;)
